Query.ValidUserOrNot: Select UserId from UserLogin where UserName = '_UserName_' and Firstname = '_UserName_'
Query.ValidUserOrNotUserName: Select UserName from UserLogin where UserName = '_UserName_' and Firstname = '_UserName_'
Query.ValidUserOrNotDeatils: Select UserId, UserName ,Email from UserLogin where UserName = '_UserName_' and Firstname = '_UserName_'
Query.CollectionOfData: Select UserId , UserName ,Email from UserLogin where UserName = 'Roshan' and Firstname='Roshan'
